mapper.select: select b.id, b.parent_id, b.domain_id, b.str_flag, b.resources_type, b.enable_auth, a.class_name, a.method_name, a.method_params, a.api_path, a.api_exist from api_permission a left join permission b on (a.permission_id = b.id) where a.class_name = #{className} and a.method_name = #{methodName} and a.method_params = #{methodParams} and b.domain_id = #{domainId}

select a.id as permission_id, a.parent_id as parent_permission_id, a.domain_id, a.str_flag, a.title, a.resources_type, a.enable_auth, a.description, b.id as api_permission_id, b.class_name, b.method_name, b.method_params, b.api_path, b.api_exist from permission a left join api_permission b on (a.id = b.permission_id) where a.resources_type=1 and domain_id=#{domainId}
